apis.description:
Updates date-related information for learning objects, including due date, availability dates,
override status, and assignment overrides.

Returns 204 No Content response code if successful.

operations.summary: Update a learning object's date information
operations.notes:
Updates date-related information for learning objects, including due date, availability dates,
override status, and assignment overrides.

Returns 204 No Content response code if successful.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: due_at
parameters.description: The learning object's due date. Not applicable for ungraded discussions, pages, and files.

parameters.name: unlock_at
parameters.description: The learning object's unlock date. Must be before the due date if there is one.

parameters.name: lock_at
parameters.description: The learning object's lock date. Must be after the due date if there is one.

parameters.name: only_visible_to_overrides
parameters.description: Whether the learning object is only assigned to students who are targeted by an override.

parameters.name: assignment_overrides
parameters.description:
List of overrides to apply to the learning object. Overrides that already exist should include
an ID and will be updated if needed. New overrides will be created for overrides in the list
without an ID. Overrides not included in the list will be deleted. Providing an empty list
will delete all of the object's overrides. Keys for each override object can include: 'id',
'title', 'due_at', 'unlock_at', 'lock_at', 'student_ids', and 'course_section_id', 'course_id',
'noop_id', and 'unassign_item'.

apis.description:
Updates date-related information for learning objects, including due date, availability dates,
override status, and assignment overrides.

Returns 204 No Content response code if successful.

operations.summary: Update a learning object's date information
operations.notes:
Updates date-related information for learning objects, including due date, availability dates,
override status, and assignment overrides.

Returns 204 No Content response code if successful.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: attachment_id
parameters.description: ID

parameters.name: due_at
parameters.description: The learning object's due date. Not applicable for ungraded discussions, pages, and files.

parameters.name: unlock_at
parameters.description: The learning object's unlock date. Must be before the due date if there is one.

parameters.name: lock_at
parameters.description: The learning object's lock date. Must be after the due date if there is one.

parameters.name: only_visible_to_overrides
parameters.description: Whether the learning object is only assigned to students who are targeted by an override.

parameters.name: assignment_overrides
parameters.description:
List of overrides to apply to the learning object. Overrides that already exist should include
an ID and will be updated if needed. New overrides will be created for overrides in the list
without an ID. Overrides not included in the list will be deleted. Providing an empty list
will delete all of the object's overrides. Keys for each override object can include: 'id',
'title', 'due_at', 'unlock_at', 'lock_at', 'student_ids', and 'course_section_id', 'course_id',
'noop_id', and 'unassign_item'.

id.description: the ID of the learning object (not present for checkpoints)

due_at.description: the due date for the learning object. returns null if not present or applicable. never applicable for ungraded discussions, pages, and files

lock_at.description: the lock date (learning object is locked after this date). returns null if not present

reply_to_topic_due_at.description: the reply_to_topic sub_assignment due_date. returns null if not present

required_replies_due_at.description: the reply_to_entry sub_assignment due_date. returns null if not present

unlock_at.description: the unlock date (learning object is unlocked after this date). returns null if not present

only_visible_to_overrides.description: whether the learning object is only visible to overrides

graded.description: whether the learning object is graded (and thus has a due date)

blueprint_date_locks.description: [exclusive to blueprint child content only] list of lock types

visible_to_everyone.description: whether the learning object is visible to everyone

checkpoints.description: list of Checkpoint objects, only present if a learning object has subAssignments

tag.description: the tag identifying the type of checkpoint (only present for checkpoints)
